question:
CPU出错录像测试方式求助 - content: 问题求救：
维护诊断>>录像截屏>>CPU出错录像测试方法，有主动注错的测试方法吗。
image1898×887 112 KB
links: https://discuss.openubmc.cn/uploads/default/original/1X/5f193ecc5a57f5a630b3b3581ba3d12d7488a163.png

reply_posts.text:
注入故障方式：
mdbctl setprop set Scanner_Cpu1CATERRAccessor_010101 bmc.kepler.Scanner Value 1

content: 在我们的机器上执行mdbctl setprop set Scanner_Cpu1CATERRAccessor_010101 bmc.kepler.Scanner Value 1报如下错：
~ ~ # mdbctl setprop set Scanner_Cpu1CATERRAccessor_010101 bmc.kepler.Scanner Value 1
iBMC.Error.Unknow: ./opt/bmc/libmc/lualib/sd_bus/object.lua:583: ./opt/bmc/apps/hwproxy/lualib/chip.lua:277: ./opt/bmc/apps/hwproxy/lualib/driver/smc.lua:139: request error, error para, para: 0, size: 2, read_len: 1
一键收集日志如下：
dump_info.zip (768.7 KB)
links: /uploads/short-url/Ap42RLlabAN02dfqydA6aUaRi6L.zip
通过mdbctl lsprop查询该属性呢
